description: HDMI 1080p upscales to high definition for sharper pictures. Progressive Scan component video for optimized image quality. 1080p Up Conversion. Watch, Forward, Rewind or Freeze Live TV while Recording. 4Way Dubbing(HDD->DVD,DVD->HDD,DV->HDD,DV->DVD). Records up to 387 hours onto 320GB HDD. Plays MP3 and JPEG digital camera photos
title: MAGNAVOX MDR513H/F7 HDD and DVD Recorder with Digital Tuner, Black (Old Version)
